Package model

Class ResearchModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Model
      • model.ResearchModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameStateModel

    public class ResearchModel
extends Model
implements GameStateModel
    This model has to handle the positions of the various research tools, and handle various popups
    Author:
    Miguel Fuentes, W Mathieu Mimms-Boyce, Devon Pirestani, Andre Green, Dylan Martin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ResearchModel​(int frameWidth, int frameHeight, Animal animalCaught, EstuaryModel goBack, CodeListener listener, boolean tutorialMode)
      This calls the super class constructor, sets some popup booleans, sets animalCaught to keep track of which animal was caught and goBack to return to the same state you came from when done researching

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResearchModel

        public ResearchModel​(int frameWidth,
                     int frameHeight,
                     Animal animalCaught,
                     EstuaryModel goBack,
                     CodeListener listener,
                     boolean tutorialMode)
        This calls the super class constructor, sets some popup booleans, sets animalCaught to keep track of which animal was caught and goBack to return to the same state you came from when done researching
        Parameters:
        frameWidth - width of the screen
        frameHeight - height of the screen
        animalCaught - which animal was caught
        goBack - the EstuaryModel that led to this state
        listener - the CodeListener
        tutorialMode - whether or not the game is in tutorial mode
